task.title: Configuring extend purge timer
task.shortdesc: Use timer iotPurgeTimer to enable or disable the extend purge timer.

step.cmd: Check the value of the IoT purge timer on the MME.
step.info: The default value is 0, and the iotPurgeTimer is disabled.

stepxmp.codeblock: cmm timer show --timer iotPurgeTimer +------------+---------------+ | Field | Value | +------------+---------------+ | timer | iotPurgeTimer | | timerName* | iotPurgeTimer | | timerValue | 0 | | timerUnit | Hour | +------------+---------------+

cmm timer modify --timerName iotPurgeTimer --timerValue 240 +------------+---------------+ | Field | Value | +------------+---------------+ | timer | iotPurgeTimer | | timerName* | iotPurgeTimer | | timerValue | 240 | | timerUnit | Hour | +------------+---------------+

step.cmd: Disable the IoT purge timer by setting the value back to 0.

stepxmp.codeblock: cmm timer modify --timerName iotPurgeTimer --timerValue 0 +------------+---------------+ | Field | Value | +------------+---------------+ | timer | iotPurgeTimer | | timerName* | iotPurgeTimer | | timerValue | 0 | | timerUnit | Hour | +------------+---------------+
